sentences.sContent: "Alli, like Xenical, will be useful for people who eat out often and don't have much control over the amount of fat they are served, " says Cederquist.
sentences.sCn: 塞德奎斯特说：“艾里和赛克宁一样，对那些常常在外面吃饭的人有用，因为他们对食物中的脂肪量没法控制。

sentences.sContent: If you eat out you will pay triple the price.
sentences.sCn: 如果出去吃，你将花三倍的价钱。

synos.tran: 上馆子吃饭；锈坏；使腐烂
